parallax.title: NEED HELP? CONTACT WITH OUR EXPERIENCED PERSONNEL!

explore.title: explore yamaha
explore.motorcyclesDescription: Discover the full range of Yamaha motorcycles, from agile commuters to track-ready legends built for performance.
explore.scootersDescription: Effortless city riding with clever storage, lightweight handling, and unmistakable Yamaha reliability.
explore.eBikesDescription: Their price/performance ratio combined with trusted technology make these eBikes the best tools for your freedom.

showcase.title: motorcycle showcase
showcase.tracerDescription: With Yamaha’s DNA running through it, TRACER 9 is a sportbike when you want, while being equally at home touring with a passenger and luggage.
showcase.xmaxDescription: Its dynamic bodywork and full LED lighting show that this high-quality machine is built with pure MAX DNA. Get on board and experience the superb riding comfort – and feel the seamless acceleration from the powerful EURO5+ engine. Experience the MAX!
showcase.nmaxDescription: Equipped with a compact body and powerful dual-eye headlights, the latest generation NMAX 125 is your best possible introduction to Yamaha's legendary MAX Sport Scooter family.
showcase.tmaxDescription: TMAX is the undisputed King of scooters. It’s been Europe’s best-selling Sport Scooter ever since the original model was launched in 2001.

reviews.title: reviews
reviews.description: Our results in Yamaha Matakos speak for themselves, but our customers say it best. Explore the real stories and experiences of people who have trusted us with their needs.

review1.text: I highly recommend them! Everything was just perfect. Friendly staff, they are extremely helpful. Super-quick process, they explain everything in detail. 5 star customer service!!!❤️
review1.name: Diana H****ka

review2.text: I want to thank Yamaha-Matakos for their excellent service. I came in with an engine light on my motorcycle, and they quickly helped diagnose and remove the issue. They were professional, efficient, and didn’t even charge me for the fix, which I really appreciate.
review2.name: Magnus H**d

review4.text: Good service very kind personel. All parts on stock
review4.name: Denis T*****r

partners.title: our partners
partners.description: Our trusted partners' commitment, expertise, and shared passion for motorcycling help us elevate the experience for our entire community. Thanks to these organisations whose support we greatly value.

article1.articleTitle: 2026 Yamaha R7: The Evolution of R/World

article2.articleTitle: TMAX 25th Anniversary. Obsessed to the MAX.

info.title: yamaha matakos
info.description1: R7. The Evolution of R/World. Born from Yamaha’s R-Series legacy, the new R7 blends advanced electronics, refined agility and striking design for everyday Supersport performance.
info.description2: The TMAX stands out as one of the most important two-wheelers that Yamaha has released in the last twenty-five years. Having sold over 340,000 units in Europe since its launch, the TMAX is one of the most successful models Yamaha has ever produced, bringing an exciting new lifestyle to thousands of riders.
info.description3: The Ténéré 700 World Raid loves to go the distance, and for 2026 it is set to go even further. The World Raid returns with new premium components, cutting-edge technology and a more refined look that take adventure lovers on to reach new heights.

about.history: YAMAHA MATAKOS has been active in the motorcycle industry since 1964, when the founder of the business, Apostolos Matakos, opened his first repair shop for two- and three-wheel vehicles in Thessaloniki, at 54 Lagkada Street.
about.expansion: In 1973, he began dealing in spare parts and accessories, and in 1978 he expanded his activities to include the import and sale of motorcycles. A few years later, in 1983, he entered into a partnership with YAMAHA Hellas and became an official representative of YAMAHA products.
about.award: Just one year later, he was invited to YAMAHA Japan along with 24 other dealers, where he distinguished himself and received an award.
about.relocation: In 1988, the company relocated to its privately-owned facilities at 120 Lagkada Street and founded the company A. MATAKOS & Co. O.E. Since then and to this day, the company has maintained a path of continuous national and international distinctions in the field of YAMAHA motorcycles, spare parts, and accessories.
about.commitment: The company A. MATAKOS & Co. O.E. is, and will always remain, in the motorcycle industry, offering riders the best possible services, with customer care and satisfaction at the forefront.

workshop.title: Common Questions
workshop.technicianDescription: Our specialized and YTA Silver Certificate–certified technical staff, trained by the Yamaha Technical Academy, offers the highest quality in the maintenance of your motorcycle.
workshop.partsDescription: The use of genuine Yamaha spare parts and consumables by our experienced technicians ensures the proper and safe operation of your motorcycle.
workshop.faq1: Can you send me an offer for purchasing a model?
workshop.faq2: When will a vehicle I ordered, which was not immediately available in the store, be delivered to me?
workshop.faq3: How can I find out the price of a spare part?
workshop.faq4: Is it possible to trade in an old vehicle?
workshop.faq5: How can I contact customer support?
workshop.faqAnswer1: For a purchase offer paying in cash, with financing, by credit card, with or without a down payment—please contact our network stores directly. If you wish to make the purchase from our showroom, you will need to visit us in person to receive a quote.
workshop.faqAnswer2: The store that accepted your order is responsible for informing you about the expected delivery date of the vehicle, as well as any possible changes to that date. Delivery time depends on the vehicle’s availability in the warehouses, the expected arrival of new stock, customs clearance in our country, and the processing time required by the transport company to deliver it to the store.
workshop.faqAnswer3: To find out the prices of spare parts, visit our store at 126 Lagkada Street, Thessaloniki, or call 2310 522774 between 09:00 and 18:00, Monday to Friday.
workshop.faqAnswer4: It is possible to trade in your old vehicle, in cooperation with the stores in our network.
workshop.faqAnswer5: You can contact us through the contact form on our website. Phone communication is not the most suitable method, as the call center and the responsible staff may be busy.

blog.description: Explore the world of Yamaha with our latest articles. Here, we go beyond the showroom. We share riding inspiration, maintenance advice, product comparisons, and real experiences that bring the Yamaha spirit to life.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This Cookie Policy explains how Yamaha Matakos uses cookies and similar technologies on our website. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies
whatAreCookies.text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to recognize your device and remember information about your visit.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.text: We use cookies for various purposes:
howWeUseCookies.item1: To ensure the proper functioning of the website
howWeUseCookies.item3: To collect anonymous statistics about website usage

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include cookies that enable basic functionality such as security and access to protected areas.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.text: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.text: These cookies allow the website to remember your choices (such as language) and provide enhanced and more personalized functionality.

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.text: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.text: Our website may use cookies from third-party services for analytical purposes. These services have their own cookie policies.

updates.title: Updates
updates.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please feel free to contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Yamaha Matakos respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We may collect the following types of personal data:
dataCollection.item2: Information you provide through contact forms
dataCollection.item5: Any other information you choose to provide us

howWeUseData.title: How We Use Data
howWeUseData.text: We use your personal data to:
howWeUseData.item1: Respond to your requests and inquiries
howWeUseData.item2: Provide you with information about our products and services
howWeUseData.item5: Protect our and our users' rights and security

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.text: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share your data only with trusted partners who help us operate the website or provide our services, and only for the purposes described in this policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.text: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
yourRights.item1: Right to access your personal data

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We keep your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires a longer retention period.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.text: Our website is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children without parental or guardian consent.

updates.title: Updates
updates.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
